title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235: When calling ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?...The output is "MySomeClass". However, I expect the output to be "MySomeClass". This issue is not yet implemented in the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code worked fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: When running the code on Tomcat 7.0.0, the output is "MySomeAnn" instead of "MySomeClass".
EB: The output should be "MySomeClass" when running the code on Tomcat 7.0.0.
